omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	GPEventsPrimaryKey,
	d.NHSNumber,
	e.EventDate
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_event e
	inner join omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic d
		on e.PatientIdentifier = d.PatientIdentifier
order by
	d.NHSNumber,
	e.EventDate

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR administration record`
